body.p: The bird you send me is the Bohemian Chatterer, or Silk-tail (see Pennant, V: 1. p: 173) the Lanius Garrulus of Linn√¶us, but in his last edition removed to the Genus Ampelis. it is no native of our island, but sometimes comes over in little flocks during a hard winter. this is a young one, varying in some particulars, especially in the remiges, where the scarlet points (ye character of ye species) do but begin to appear. &c:
